arts.ttl: Derby County vs Coventry City Preview: EFL Championship, Gameweek 2, 2025
arts.sum: However, Derby County were a side that Lampard's men struggled against last season, as the Rams prevailed both home and away, scoring four goals and only conceding one over the two meetings. The Sky Blues will be looking to pick up an important three points for their campaign against Derby.
